name: Fish Frenzy Mania
description:
Play the addictive new puzzle game from the makers of Candy Blast Mania, Jewel Mania and Bubble Mania!

Dive into Fish Frenzy Mania™, with its explosive new bubble-growing puzzle mechanic! Match bubbles to make them bigger, then pop them to set off an aquatic chain reaction!

- SPLASH through 100+ Levels of deep-sea fun as you match colorful bubbles in a variety of undersea shapes!
- GROW your pieces to maximum size by making matches, then watch them pop!
- MASTER challenging gameplay modes! Gather bubbles, and dig deep below the ocean floor in search of sunken Treasure!
- RIDE A WAVE past tricky obstacles, such as Seaweed, Statues, and unfriendly Crabs!
- SWELL your score with Boosts like the Cross Wave and Splash Nova!
- EXPLORE tropical beaches, sunken reefs, and lush islands -- and who knows what you might find in the watery deeps?
- EARN keys by completing Challenges to unlock Gems, Boosts, and more!
- FREE levels added regularly, so the puzzles don't stop!

Fish Frenzy Mania™ is FREE TO PLAY on iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch.

Please note that Fish Frenzy Mania™ is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items with real money. To delete this feature, on your device go to Settings Menu -> General -> Restrictions option. You can then simply turn off In-App Purchases under "Allowed Content". In addition, Fish Frenzy Mania™ may link to social media services, such as Facebook, and Storm8 will have access to your information through such services.
